covidExplorer: Contains a Shiny App with Summaries, Analytics and News related to COVID-19

Source: R/covidExplorer-package.R
covidExplorer-package.Rd

The package deploys a shiny app that allows users to interactively browse data regarding the spread of COVID-19 in various countries. The purpose of the app is to offer a summary of information regarding COVID-19 with emphasis being given on new cases and latest implemented measures. Finally, the app gives the user to scrape data from Twitter. The datasets are being updated daily. Figures in the Measures tab can be exported as png images.
